name: BlindSweeper
description:
Blindsweeper is an audiogame based on the classic "Minesweeper" idea. You are randomly placed at the north end of an arena in a cruel futuristic game show - your goal is to survive the minefield, losing the game means losing everything.

Menu selection and in-game movement use the arrow keys. Your mine detector will become louder and faster the closer you are to a mine. The exit beacon, which is situated at the southern end of the arena, emits a different sound which also gets louder and faster as you closer to it.

Everything is randomly generated each game so don't think you can just remember a path through the mines!!

This game was created for #audiogamejam3
